Reviews.Title: They do what they claim, but beware the hidden gotcha
Reviews.Author: Mac Coder
Reviews.Content: These are perfectly competent video baluns, and honestly described in the product description.However, all purchasers of such items should be aware that while such inexpensive passive baluns will provide the desired impedance matching and common-mode rejection, they do NOT provide any sort of isolation at all -- they are wired in an autotransformer configuration.As a result, they provide ZERO protection for the video ports on your camera/DVR/whatever.You can see this yourself without gutting one by simply using an ohm-meter to measure the resistance from the balanced line terminals to the BNC terminal -- you will discover that one of the BL terminals is directly connected to one of the BNC terminals, and the other has a very low resistance between it and the other BNC terminal.Or you can go to the Wikipedia article for BALUN and see a schematic of a typical balun, right under the subtitle: "Types of balun"If you are running video over twisted pair, I sincerely recommend using some sort of grounded lightning/surge protection device between the BALUN and your more expensive widgets, like a DVR. The newer, inexpensive security DVRs do not seem to have much in the way of internal protection on them, and a nearby lightning strike or whatnot can easily generate voltages on the twisted pair that will fry an input port. Cameras seem to be more durable.

Reviews.Title: Cheap but work
Reviews.Author: SamIAm "JustMe"
Reviews.Content: Items work as promised.  However they are cheap.  The spring on the locking ring is weak and the fitting is loose.  If you wiggle or bump them the video goes OUT or becomes noisy.  This is a pain if you put the balun into the camera housing and later have to disassemble the camera again to wiggle the balun.  If I had to do over, I would buy better quality baluns.  The size is good and the fact that there isn't a cable hanging of them is also a plus to me.  However they do work as long as you dont touch or wiggle them.

Reviews.Title: Must have
Reviews.Author: Cuffy
Reviews.Content: These passive BNC Video Baluns sure make wiring video systems super-simple and fast!  Until I got a mail-order video surveillance system I had no familiarity with this equipment; I'm a senior citizen DIY'er experienced with auto and home wiring, and bygone days of entertainment system wiring.  Video wire is close to hair-thin (think phone wires), so having these Baluns with the screw-clamp insertion points for the wire makes putting them on easy, even with time-desensitized fingers!  :-)  I ordered 'just enough' but will be ordering more for 'supply' and further wiring additions.  Indispensable and terrifically priced.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: anthony smith
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this product.  I will definitely buy more of these  for all of my camera jobs.

Reviews.Title: Mini CCTV BNC Video Balun
Reviews.Author: viper1m
Reviews.Content: Bought this item to test it out and, it works ok for the price I paid for.just make sure not to move the balun from DVR once you get it to workotherwise it will loose signal.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Celson Hubner Junior
Reviews.Content: I look by internet in site amazon.I  by for me and my son.I recommended For every oneThe price is very good

Reviews.Title: Surprising good!
Reviews.Author: Mike Krivsky
Reviews.Content: Received a 6 pack of the CCTV baluns for use with cat6 cable instead of coax.  I actually hooked up 50' of coax and 50' of cat6 with these baluns at the same time and could not notice a difference in picture.  I also like how the screw terminals are on these very easy to use. These baluns are smaller then other baluns Ive used making them a little bit easier to fit in back boxes and such.  For the price they seem well worth it.

Reviews.Title: BNC transceivers
Reviews.Author: Michael goetaski
Reviews.Content: They all worked good. I had a few of the screws that were a little stuck /tight but for the price all worked good

Reviews.Title: Buy extra! Beware Center Pin to Negative, and know what you really expect!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Wagner
Reviews.Content: This last purchase we had 7 bad ones out of 5 sets of these (worst EVER). Not sure they are all the same manufacturer as there were light gray, dark gray, and black ones. The black ones seem to be the worst as many you could tell the pin wasn't all the way in and testing continuity with a multi-meter showed no connection to the positive terminal or the negative for that matter (we had two wired to negative from center pin so just switching the wires around fixes that). I've used these on several jobs regardless as you just can't beat the price point. Passive balun's are exactly that, they are not going to protect you from lightning or boost signal or fix interference. So know what your buying and plan around it. I also will let you know the really light gray ones do have a tendency to burn out and you can physically see rippling on the surface where it did so (only had about 4 of these that didn't happen right away). This may have been fixed as within the last 5 months or so I haven't had any issues like that and have installed well over 300 of these within the last few years. The former statements of weak connection spring was indeed the case about a year ago but now I often see the reverse where it's hard as hell to get them to lock in.

Reviews.Title: Standard Video Balun
Reviews.Author: Kris C
Reviews.Content: Just your standard BNC Balun, works like they all do. No complaints, none have failed and I will order more when needed.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Chris Dangan
Reviews.Content: Great product. Works well. Recently installed a CCTV systemAnd this baluns makes wiring an ease. Will by again definitely

Reviews.Title: Wery nice little balins
Reviews.Author: Powersat
Reviews.Content: 6 PAIRS (12 Pcs) Mini CCTV BNC Video BalunNice little baluns, good quality, half price than local cable store, will by again, recommend!

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: RICH MILLER
Reviews.Content: These little baluns save a lot of time and money! We use CAT5 cable on all of our jobs big and small with these and save tons of money!

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: scott
Reviews.Content: Worked great for what I needed them for. They did a great job connecting to the Cat5 cable that I used to run my CCTV cameras

Reviews.Title: Big Easy
Reviews.Author: AMOS CHANDLER
Reviews.Content: Product does what it is listed to do and very easy to attach wires to. I am looking forward to buying in the future

Reviews.Title: Good Price and quick delivery
Reviews.Author: Frederick Scott
Reviews.Content: I like the product and it was everything that I expected in this product.  I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: Luis V.
Reviews.Content: very successful in my choice of this magnificent product has all the requirements both electrical and mechanical technicians, sonmuy slender and good-looking, well design.

Reviews.Title: Worked for me.
Reviews.Author: David C. Potts
Reviews.Content: These units were priced to sell. They do what a Balun is supposed to do. Match a Balanced signal to an un-balanced connection. Balun.. Balanced to Unbalanced.

Reviews.Title: Great price excellent quality
Reviews.Author: Randall
Reviews.Content: These baluns work flawlessly.  Just as good as any other $10/a pair passive balun at a fraction of the cost.

Reviews.Title: works perfect
Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: Great for installing cctv, easy to use. Video comes out clean and clear, i use all the time for all installations

Reviews.Title: These baluns work like there were intended to
Reviews.Author: Cliff Wild
Reviews.Content: I am glad I found these baluns. They do what they are intended to and I can recommend them to anyone. Quick delivery and well packaged.

Reviews.Title: I give FIVE STARS
Reviews.Author: EDDY ROMAN
Reviews.Content: Good product, arrived on time, it works great and I give FIVE STARS, PERFECT FUNTION, THE PRICE IS VERY GOOD

Reviews.Title: Great connector
Reviews.Author: Charles M. Moughamian
Reviews.Content: They worked ok for what I was using them. The screws were cheap and could have been made a tad bit better but over all did the job I needed them to do.

Reviews.Title: Baluns
Reviews.Author: MR.O
Reviews.Content: They work great. When used with Cat-5e cable and SC Power jack adaptersmakes long distance for power and video a snap.

Reviews.Title: Mini Baluns
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: These work great! They allow you to run cat5e data cable from your cameras to your dvr. You are not limited by the length of premade camera cables. This route is much cheaper with less connections to degrade your signal.

Reviews.Title: Great video baluns at a nice price.
Reviews.Author: Blade "Blade"
Reviews.Content: The seem solidly built and work perfectly.  Screw terminals get nice and tight.  Video quality is as good as coax.

Reviews.Title: Magici!
Reviews.Author: Installer
Reviews.Content: These little guys are the trick! Sends video over Cat5 for really long distances. We ran these 1,600 ft in a courthouse and had no issues whatsoever. Combine these with some power connectors (ASIN: B0058RLD9C) and 1 Cat5 cable is all you gotta pull to your cameras! And if you ever want to upgrade standard cameras to Pan/Tilt/Zoom cameras in the future, you can use one of the extra wire pairs in the Cat5 for RS-485 to control the camera, so one cable is all you'll ever need.

Reviews.Title: Good product - Great price
Reviews.Author: g.bo
Reviews.Content: I used these baluns for the video connections (cameras & DVR) in a wired (CAT5e) security cam network (Q-See). Two months of continuous use and no problems! Cameras are mounted outside under eaves, and since the connections are somewhat protected from vertical rain, no special or extra encapsulation was used.

Reviews.Title: baluns
Reviews.Author: Ernie Mandado
Reviews.Content: great service.  items came in as promised.  items worked as described in the item description.  would do business again with this vendor.

Reviews.Title: These are REAL baluns!
Reviews.Author: AgentSmith
Reviews.Content: Okay, so you've been looking for CAT5 => BNC video baluns - and so far, all you can find are ones that produce nasty looking video and cross-talk - Right?  Well, let me tell you, these little jewels ARE real baluns - The ohm out on the meter - and they produce FANTASTIC video - Sharp, clear, zero cross-talk - All, for a very reasonable price.  In my humble opinion these baluns are worth the extra effort to replace whatever fake baluns you may have installed.

ProductInfo.Features:
6 PAIRS (12 pcs.) Mini CCTV BNC Video Balun
Easy installation, using the standard UTP cable system
